channel.title: translated on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in translated on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Senthamizh Naatu Thamizhachiye: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: Here is a song from the movie Vandicholai Chinraasu. For the light comical tune it keeps, the last verse is incongruously preachy. It reflects the morals and values of the early 90s especially in smaller towns.

item.title: Naan Malarodu Thaniyaga- Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This is a sweet romantic song from the â€™60s. Thanks to my dad for making sense of the last verse! **nAn malarOdu thaniyAga yEn ingu ninREn
